728535f-a.title: Richmond: Bay Street - Lynhurst Avenue
728535f-a.text:
Bay Street, adjoining the N.E. corner of
Lynhurst Avenue, showing an old brick house. The
1898 and 1907 insurance atlases show it to have
been owned by James Thompson.
February 2, 1931
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
728535f-a.folder: Bay Street & Lynhurst Avenue, Staten Island, NY
